US State Department spokesperson Simon Cowell Crowley, speaking to reporters in Washington yesterday, too indicated that Cameron Munter had called on Asif Ali Zardari to release the arrested official. We continue to make clear to the government of Pakistan that our diplomat has diplomatic immunity; in our view,( he) was acting in self-defence and should be released... Ambassador Cameron Munter met... with President Asif Ali Zardari to continue to make that point, he said. The increased US pressure came against the backdrop of reports that the Obama administration had suspended all high-level contacts with the Pakistan government over the detention of the US official.
